section.title: Image formats
section.p:
Image formats that should be used in the documentation are:
PNG
JPG
SVG We should not use other image formats.

section.title: Image scaling
section.p: Images should not be scaled dynamically. That means the @scale attribute should not be used on the image element. If you need a different image size, use an image processing application to obatin the size you want.

dlentry.dd: Please do not scale images dynamically.
